article.title: Sullivan Assigned to Office of the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense for Public Affairs
article.abstract: Maura C. Sullivan has been appointed as the assistant to the secretary of defense, public affairs, Office of the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense for Public Affairs, Pentagon, Arlington, Virginia.
article.text: Maura C. Sullivan has been appointed as the assistant to the secretary of defense, public affairs, Office of the Assistant to the Secretary of Defense for Public Affairs, Pentagon, Arlington, Virginia.
